attributes.action: Consider the demographics of the vote when deciding about the UK's future
attributes.additional_details:
Those voters who predominantly voted "Remain" (the younger the age group, the higher the percentage of "Remain" votes*) will have to live the longest with the consequences if Britain leaves the EU.

* Source: https://d25d2506sfb94s.cloudfront.net/cumulus_uploads/document/oxmidrr5wh/EUFinalCall_Reweighted.pdf
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call upon HM government and the House of Commons to seriously consider the demographics of the EU referendum vote in the debates and negotiations about Britain's future with the EU.
